name: Blazz
description:
following Screen Shots came from the only level currently playable : Tutorial.
I'm still searching the final visual identity of the game. If you are a graphist or if you just want to be part of the adventure, let me know your interest by using the community section below.

Current version  : Early Acces V0.0.5A
(More details on devLog Section)

Current Language is French

Control :
Q - D : move Left and right
Z - Space : Jump, Climb, Move Up
Right Click : Soul Link
